ygData.subject: Please, Don't Die!
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor lookes over the smashed and battered body of Prowl, not even noticing the sound of her own spark beating in her systems. She listened to Firearm

Subject: Please, Don't Die!

X-OriginalArrivalTime: 01 Oct 2000 22:12:06.0821 (UTC) FILETIME=[A2B5C550:01C02BF4]
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>


* Iron Raptor lookes over the smashed and battered body of Prowl, not even 
noticing the sound of her own spark beating in her systems.
She listened to Firearm tell her what happened, shaking her head slightly as 
she listened.
Oblitertron did this?
She looked over the damage that Prowl had sustained in disbelieve, only a 
few mega-cycles ago he had been with her in the Conference Room. Alive and 
not a scratch on him.
She was stunned.
Iron Raptor took Prowl from Firearm and leaned his battered and torn body 
against the wall beside a CR chamber, knowing that Firearms words were true 
as she kneeled.
Prowl was too damaged and few gone for a chamber, and she could see that his 
chest was still and no longer took in breath.
It was so hard to belive that her love was actually here, in her arms, 
dying.
But with her hands wet with his mech-fluid, reality was far too real.
Iron Raptor looked over Prowl once again, swallowing a lump that had grown 
in her throat.
She stroked her fingers long his bloody face.*

" Wake up, please?"

* Her voice nothing more then a whisper.*

" You have to wake up...please...please."

* She gently shook his shoulder, her voice cracking a bit and her optics 
becoming wet.*

" Please? Just wake up...everything'll be fine. You just have to wake up."

* Iron Raptor just couldn't grasp just what was happening, not willing to 
accept that Prowl would die.
She shook his shoulder-plate once again.
Remembering how she refused to let him touch her before just for a stupid 
commant, then then watching him run out with Kluster...the last time she saw 
him active.*

" Prowl? I'm sorry for what I did and never let you near me, I'm sorry. Just 
please don't die."

* By now there were tears running down her face, her voice already cracking 
with the strain it took to make words instead of sobs.
This couldn't be happening, not like this!
Iron Raptor remembered how she had refused his embrace and it tore her in 
half, because if he died now she would never feel his arms around her again.
Never feel his warmth and never see him smile.
Never hear him laugh or joke about her weight every time he flew her 
somewhere.
It would be all gone, forever.
She looked at the torn Prowl through foggy eyes before she found herself 
hugging him to her, his head resting against the flat of her chest.
Iron Raptor looked down at him, resting her cheek against his bloodied 
forehead. Her tears running fron her eyes and onto his armor, washing away 
small streaks of mech-fluid.*

" Don't die."

* Her voice was now more of a pleading whimper by now, her sides slightly 
heaving as she silently cried and held her only love to her. Clining to him 
almost as if that alone would bring him back to life and everything would be 
OK.
She remembered even how they had met the first time, literally falling for 
each other.
Rampage had thrown her against Prowl and they both ended up in a heap, and 
Prowl had never gotten angry, he had joked about it.
She remembered his exact words. " Don't worry about it, I like it when wemon 
sit on me."
But she didn't smile at remembering that memory, only cried harder.
She would never hear his voice again.
Iron Raptor would give anything in the universe just for Prowl to call her a 
truck right there and then, but all that echoed around that room was 
silence...and her mournful sobs.*
